import styles from './styles.module.scss' import { AiOutlineLogin, AiOutlineMenu } from "react-icons/ai" import { FiUserPlus, FiShoppingCart, FiCodesandbox } from 'react-icons/fi' import { FaRegUserCircle } from 'react-icons/fa' import { BiCoinStack } from 'react-icons/bi' import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export function Sidebar() { const [sidebarState, setsidebarState] = useState(false) const userId = localStorage.getItem('userId') const isLogged = userId ? true : false return (
setsidebarState(!sidebarState)}>
Produtos
{isLogged ? : } {isLogged ? 'Compras' : 'Cadastrar-se'}
Carrinho
{isLogged ?
: } {isLogged ? 'Meu perfil' : 'Entrar'}
) }
